subject: Baseball
September 11 (2001)
lead_paragraph: The Mets were front and center again on Sunday night as fans stood in unison and began chanting “U.S.A.!” when news of Osama bin Laden’s death began to spread.
snippet: The Mets were front and center again on Sunday night as fans stood in unison and began chanting “U.S.A.!” when news of Osama bin Laden’s death began to spread.
